artisans.name: Mercy Racaldo
artisans.bio: A master weaver from Cagayan with 20+ years of experience in traditional abaca weaving. Mercy's work preserves the cultural heritage of Filipino textile arts.

artisans.name: Rosario Cruz
artisans.bio: A passionate ceramicist dedicated to bringing traditional pottery techniques into modern homes. Rosario creates unique pieces that blend art and functionality.

artisans.name: Rodrigo Santos
artisans.bio: A talented wood carver specializing in intricate Filipino designs. Each piece reflects the stories and traditions of Philippine culture.
